alert.note: Alert for Logan; Washington (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 27 at 9:22PM MDT until July 27 at 10:00PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Washington County in northeastern Colorado... Southeastern Logan County in northeastern Colorado... * Until 1000 PM MDT. * At 921 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles north of Burdett, or 17 miles southeast of Sterling, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Burdett around 935 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Lone Star. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
